i had to download it for checking , it is not NT6 RC based . make your usb bootable with grub4dos (check sticky )   

then mount your spotmau cd , copy its contents as it is to root of usb. use the following command in menu.lst   

title spotmau 2010  
chainloader /bootmgr  

or from commandline  

press C when you see the menu . and do   

chainloader /bootmgr ENTER  
boot ENTER  

done.   

OR   

if you have ultra iso installed , open iso with ultraiso , go to \>bootable\>write discimage . select your usb (it will be formated ) and press write .   

reply back if you need any further help.
